General.description: Methylorubrum extorquens 0355 is a mesophilic, Gram-negative bacterium that was isolated from air.

strain history.history: <- NCIB; NCIB 9133 (Pseudomonas) {1978} <- P. H. A. Sneath; 0355 (Pseudomonas) <- J. R. Quayle; AM1 (Pseudomonas)
T. Urakami TK 0004 <-- NCIB 9133 <-- P. H. A. Sneath D355.

LPSN.full scientific name: Methylorubrum extorquens (Urakami and Komagata 1984 ex Bassalik 1913) Green and Ardley 2018

Name and taxonomic classification.full scientific name: Methylorubrum extorquens (Urakami and Komagata 1984) Green and Ardley 2018

culture medium.name: NUTRIENT AGAR (DSMZ Medium 1)
culture medium.composition:
Name: NUTRIENT AGAR (DSMZ Medium 1; with strain-specific modifications)
Composition:
Agar 15.0 g/l
Methanol 10.0 g/l
Peptone 5.0 g/l
Meat extract 3.0 g/l
Distilled water

16S sequences.description: Methylobacterium extorquens 16S ribosomal RNA gene, partial sequence; tRNA-Ile and tRNA-Ala genes, complete sequence; and 23S ribosomal RNA gene, partial sequence
